traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.desc: While the hell moth is grappling a creature, the hell moth takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the hell moth takes the other half.

traits.name: Keen Scent
traits.desc: The hell moth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on scent.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and blinded, and the hell moth can’t engulf another target.

actions.name: Immolation (1/Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The hell moth detonates, dealing 33 (6d10) fire damage to itself and any grappled creature.
